statements: SELECT full_name, age, weight_class FROM Boxers
SELECT * FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class='Middleweight'
SELECT full_name, age FROM Boxers ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT full_name, age, progress_over_time->>'strength' AS strength_progress FROM Boxers
SELECT boxer_id, full_name, training_schedule->>'main_goal' AS main_training_goal FROM Boxers
SELECT * FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight' AND age > 30 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, age FROM Boxers WHERE progress_over_time->>'wins' > progress_over_time->>'losses' ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM Boxers WHERE boxers_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT full_name, training_schedule->'training_days'->>0 AS first_training_day FROM Boxers WHERE training_schedule @> '{"rest_days": ["Saturday", "Sunday"]}';
SELECT full_name, age, progress_over_time->>'win_percentage' AS win_rate FROM Boxers WHERE progress_over_time @> '{"wins": 15, "losses": 5}' ORDER BY win_rate DESC;
SELECT name, weight_class FROM boxers;
SELECT height, dob FROM boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Featherweight';
SELECT * FROM training_schedule WHERE session_type = 'Sparring' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT boxer_id, session_duration FROM training_schedule WHERE session_duration > 60;
SELECT id, name FROM boxers WHERE height > 180 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, weight_class FROM boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Welterweight'
SELECT name, weight_class, height FROM boxers ORDER BY height DESC
SELECT * FROM boxers WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01'
SELECT id, date, session_duration FROM training_schedule WHERE session_type = 'Sparring' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT name, weight_class, height FROM boxers WHERE height BETWEEN 170.0 AND 180.0
SELECT * FROM Boxers;
SELECT name, weight_class FROM Boxers ORDER BY weight_class DESC;
SELECT id, name, weight_class FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Lightweight';
SELECT * FROM TrainingSchedule WHERE workout_type = 'Strength Training' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT boxer_id, date, weight_kg FROM Progress WHERE weight_kg > 70 ORDER BY weight_kg ASC, date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Lightweight';
SELECT name, weight_class FROM Boxers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM TrainingSchedule WHERE duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, weight_kg AS weight, body_fat_percentage AS body_fat FROM Boxers JOIN Progress ON Boxers.id = Progress.boxer_id WHERE weight_kg < 70 AND body_fat_percentage > 20;

SELECT Boxers.name, TrainingSchedule.date, Progress.weight_kg, Progress.body_fat_percentage FROM Boxers JOIN TrainingSchedule ON Boxers.id = TrainingSchedule.boxer_id JOIN Progress ON Boxers.id = Progress.boxer_id WHERE TrainingSchedule.workout_type = 'Strength Training' ORDER BY Progress.weight_kg DESC, Progress.body_fat_percentage ASC;
SELECT * FROM Boxers;
SELECT name, weight FROM Boxers WHERE weight > 70;
SELECT session_date, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, training_sessions.session_date, NOW()) AS minutes_elapsed FROM TrainingSessions;
SELECT boxer_id, workout_name, reps_completed, weight_lifted FROM WorkoutProgress WHERE reps_completed >= 10 ORDER BY weight_lifted DESC;
SELECT boxer_id, date_visited, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM MedicalRecords WHERE date_visited BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Boxers;
SELECT name, weight, height FROM Boxers WHERE weight > 70 ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT session_date, duration_minutes, trainer, name FROM TrainingSessions INNER JOIN Boxers ON TrainingSessions.boxer_id = Boxers.boxer_id WHERE name LIKE '%a%' ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(reps_completed) AS max_reps, MIN(weight_lifted) AS min_weight_lifted FROM WorkoutProgress;

SELECT Boxers.name AS boxer_name, MedicalRecords.date_visited, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Boxers LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Boxers.boxer_id = MedicalRecords.boxer_id WHERE MedicalRecords.diagnosis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Boxers;
SELECT boxer_name, weight_class FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Lightweight';
SELECT track_date, weight_kg FROM ProgressTrack ORDER BY track_date DESC;
SELECT boxer_name, session_date, session_time, session_duration FROM Boxers INNER JOIN TrainingSchedule ON Boxers.boxer_id = TrainingSchedule.boxer_id;
SELECT * FROM MatchHistory WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Middleweight';
SELECT boxer_name, weight_class FROM Boxers ORDER BY boxer_name DESC;
SELECT boxer_name, COUNT(*) AS sessions_count FROM Boxers INNER JOIN TrainingSchedule ON Boxers.boxer_id = TrainingSchedule.boxer_id GROUP BY boxer_name;
SELECT Boxers.boxer_name, ProgressTrack.weight_kg FROM Boxers INNER JOIN ProgressTrack ON Boxers.boxer_id = ProgressTrack.boxer_id WHERE ProgressTrack.weight_kg > 70;
SELECT boxer_name AS Winner, match_date AS Date FROM Boxers INNER JOIN MatchHistory ON Boxers.boxer_id = MatchHistory.winner_id ORDER BY match_date ASC;
